Title: Sea Surface Wind, NOAA NCEI blended 6hr averaged 0.25\u00b0 Version 2.0, Science Quality (1987-recent), 6 hour
Summary:
This netCDF file  contains 0.25-degree globally gridded and 6-hourly ocean surface vector winds created by the NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI).The dataset covers from July 1987 to present with quasi-daily updates. Averaged daily and monthly data are also available. Details can be found at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/marineocean-data/blended-global/blended-sea-winds

cdm_data_type = Grid
VARIABLES (all of which use the dimensions [time][zlev][latitude][longitude]):
u_wind (zonal wind component, m s-1)
v_wind (meridional wind component, m s-1)
mask (Blended Wind land/ocean/lake/river/model mask)

Title: Sea Surface Wind, NOAA NCEI blended daily averaged 0.25\u00b0 Version 2.0, Science Quality (1987-recent), Daily
Summary:
This netCDF file  contains 0.25-degree globally gridded daily mean ocean surface vector winds created by the NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI).The dataset covers from July 1987 to present with quasi-daily updates. 6-hourly and averaged monthly data are also available. Details can be found at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/marineocean-data/blended-global/blended-sea-winds

cdm_data_type = Grid
VARIABLES (all of which use the dimensions [time][zlev][latitude][longitude]):
windspeed (magnitude of the wind velocity, m s-1)
mask (Blended Wind land/ocean/lake/river mask)
u_wind (zonal wind component, m s-1)
v_wind (meridional wind component, m s-1)

Title: Sea Surface Wind Stress, NOAA NCEI blended 6 hour averaged 0.25\u00b0 Version 2.0, Science Quality (1987-recent), 6 hour
Summary:
This netCDF file  contains 0.25-degree globally gridded and 6-hourly ocean surface wind stresses created by the NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) using wind directions estimated from ERA-5 Wind vectors.The dataset covers from July 1987 to present with quasi-daily updates. Averaged daily and monthly data are also available. Details can be found at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/marineocean-data/blended-global/blended-sea-winds

cdm_data_type = Grid
VARIABLES (all of which use the dimensions [time][zlev][latitude][longitude]):
x_tau (Sea Surface Wind Stress: x-component, N m-2)
y_tau (Sea Surface Wind Stress: y-component, N m-2)
mask (Blended Wind land/ocean/lake/river/model mask)

Summary:
This netCDF file  contains 0.25-degree globally gridded daily mean ocean surface wind stresses created by the NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI).The dataset covers from July 1987 to present with quasi-daily updates. 6-hourly and averaged monthly data are also available. Title: Sea Surface Wind Stress, NOAA NCEI blended monthly averaged 0.25\u00b0 Version 2.0, Science Quality (1987-recent), Monthly
Summary:
This netCDF file  contains 0.25-degree globally gridded Monthly mean ocean surface wind stresses created by the NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI). The dataset covers from July 1987 to present, with monthly resolution in this dataset. 6-hourly and averaged daily data are also available. Details can be found at https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/data-access/marineocean-data/blended-global/blended-sea-winds

cdm_data_type = Grid
VARIABLES (all of which use the dimensions [time][zlev][latitude][longitude]):
x_tau (Sea Surface Wind Stress: x-component, N m-2)
y_tau (Sea Surface Wind Stress: y-component, N m-2)
mask (Blended Wind land/ocean/lake/river mask)
